Text:
I'm a bit confused, how is there up to part 8 on here already?

 The show just started lastnight and was only on for 2hrs.
@ust2: The show started on april 3rd and the last 2 episodes aired last night (according to imdb)

Well it's defintely for real :)

 It just started here Sunday night with the first two episode too, I guess my cable networks are behind the times.
"The miniseries began in the United Kingdom on 7 April and on 10 April 2011 in Canada"

episodes 1 and 2 aired on 4/3, ep 3 and 4 aired on the 5th, 5 aired on the 6th, ep 6 aired on the 7th, and ep 7 and 8 aired on the 10th.

Strange schedule, but so is the network it aired on.
